bgBlur.title: Background Blur
bgBlur.description: Blur background when search box is focused. This option may affect performance.

focusWhenLaunch.title: Auto Focus
focusWhenLaunch.description: When enabled, the search box will be focused when the page is launched.

elementBackdrop.title: Element Backdrop Effect
elementBackdrop.description: Add backdrop blur effect on some elements. This option may affect performance.

showShortcutOnFocus.title: Display web shortcuts when typing
showShortcutOnFocus.description: When enabled, web shortcuts are still displayed when the search box is focused.

introText.title: Welcome to SparkHome! üëè
introText.introText:
It's a browser homepage that aims for simplicity and efficiency, while maintaining beauty and functionality.

You can try typing anything you want to know into the search box. Or maybe... before you hit enter, you'll already get the answer to your question.

Now, click the button below to get started. Just click on the search box or hit the space bar to get ready to search.

Of course, there are many more features waiting for you to explore!
